about_the_game:
Welcome to BattleClaws, a thrilling local multiplayer claw 'em up that pits you against your friends in an intense mechanical showdown!
Prepare for chaotic fun as you race against the clock to outscore your rivals in a party game that will challenge your skills and test your friendships.

Multiple Game Modes:

Battle Mode: Elimination is the name of the game. Each round, the player with the lowest score is knocked out. Only the sharpest claw will survive until the end!
Custom Mode: Create your own tournament rules. No eliminations here, but whoever wins the most rounds is crowned champion.

Game Changing Power-Ups

Turn the tide of battle with electrifying power-ups that can make or break your game. Snag these collectibles to unleash chaos and dominate the competition!
Speed Boost - Leave your opponents in the dust while you zip around the arena.
Double Points - Double the points, half the work.
Shuffle Zones - Balls dropping a little too conveniently for everyone else? Switch it up to level the playing field!
Lock Down - Seal off critical drop zones to shut down your opponents and secure your path to victory!
Frozen Metal - Freeze the other players solid and make those precious seconds count!

Clawmetics!

Customize your claw with a clawsmetic of your choice! Stand out from the other claws and battle it out in style.

Important Note:

BattleClaws is designed for local multiplayer action, meaning you'll need an additional controller to join the fray. Early Access Build supports one player using keyboard WASD to move and SPACE to grab/drop. Grab a friend and an extra controller to dive into the chaotic fun and experience the thrill of claw machine battles together. Whether you're facing off in Battle Mode or creating your own tournaments in Custom Mode, the more players, the merrier the mayhem!

short_description: Experience the ultimate local multiplayer claw 'em up! Battle for glory in this fast-paced arcade elimination game. Collect prizes for points, outlast your rivals, and be the last claw standing. Dominate the leaderboard and prove you’re the ultimate BattleClaws champion!
